pli-tv-bi-vb-np12:2.2.11: Nuns’ relinquishment 13 to 30 are respectively identical to the monks’ relinquishment: 1, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 1:0.5; 2, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 2:0.5; 3, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 3:0.5; 6, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 6:0.5; 7, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 7:0.5; 8, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 8:0.5; 9, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 9:0.5; 10, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 10:0.5; 18, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 18:0.5; 19, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 19:0.5; 20, LI Tv Bu Vb NP 20:0.5; 22, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 22:0.5; 23, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 23:0.5; 25, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 25:0.5; 26, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 26:0.5; 27, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 27:0.5; 28, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 28:0.5; 30, Pli Tv Bu Vb NP 30:0.5; with appropriate gender changes.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np12:2.2.12.0: At this point the Pali reads (Dutiya) Pattavagga to indicate the last chapter of nissaggiya pācittiya rules for the nuns. This indication is redundant in the present translation, since I have pointed to all the missing rules, including direct references to their counterparts in the chapter on nissaggiys pācittiya rules for the bhikkhus.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np12:2.2.13.0: At this point the Pali reads Pariṇatasikkhāpada to indicate the last rule in the chapter of nissaggiya pācittiya rules for the nuns. This indication is redundant in the present translation, since I have pointed to all the missing rules immediately below, including direct references to their counterparts in the chapter on nissaggiya pācittiya rules for the bhikkhus.
